name: Jet! Airplane games for kids & little pilots free
name_original: Jet! Airplane games for kids & little pilots free
description:
Jet! Airplane Games For Kids Free - Is your little pilot a big lover of aeroplane? If so, he or she is sure to love all of the games found in this app. Have an awesome time playing withy memory games, an awesome real puzzle, and the most fun of all... jet and airplane sounds. The app designed for ages 3 and up!

Jet Fighter Games For Kids: This exciting activity app is filled with engaging jet flying Sounds your little pilot can explore in the air...but the Airplane! Air Fighter Games doesn't end there. The activity app also comes with an aeroplane matching game , and many beautiful, real jets puzzle games.
Designed for 2 years and up. Gameplay is very simple and suited for younger children - when the sound of a plane is played your kid needs to touch on a friendly picture.

Main features:
- Real, high quality sounds of airplanes and helicopter
- 2 fun memory games of air plane pictures
- 20 Real, high quality puzzles for 4 difficulty level with helicopters and fighter jet
- Free, Ads support development of future updates and new games for kids.

Another amazingly cool feature to the Air Fighter Games For Kids makes it even more awesome then just matching- your little cop must find the icons that link for their match choices! And when they do make a linked match the little flying game shows them the link. This important element, and the matching itself, provides a real educational bonus and playing Jet! Airplane Games For Kids also promotes:
-Fine motor skills.
-Memory and recognition skills.
-Hand eye coordination.
-Early math concepts.
-Air fighter knowledge

This application is under active development, we always welcome your suggestion to improve "jets sounds and puzzles" application.
Please send us email on appkeszito101 [-at-] gmail.com

Don't wait! Download now and enjoy!
